sentences.en: a slow walker
sentences.cn: 慢慢走着的人

sentences.en: Both drugs slow the progression of HIV, but neither cures the disease.
sentences.cn: 这两种药物都可以延缓艾滋病病情发展，但是都不能治愈这种疾病。

sentences.en: Carol was absent-minded and a little slow on the uptake.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔心不在焉，反应有点迟钝。

sentences.en: Don't be faint-hearted when things seem a bit slow or boring.
sentences.cn: 事情变得有点沉闷无聊的时候，不要胆怯。

sentences.en: Electric whisks should be used on a slow speed.
sentences.cn: 使用自动搅拌器时应该选用慢挡。

sentences.en: Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a slow boil.
sentences.cn: 往平底锅里加满水，小火煮沸。

sentences.en: He topped her glass up after complaining she was a slow drinker.
sentences.cn: 他抱怨她喝得太慢，随即又把她的杯子续满。

sentences.en: Her breathing slowed and she fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 她呼吸慢下来，睡着了。

sentences.en: I am making good progress—slow but sure.
sentences.cn: 我一直都在进步——慢但却很稳。

sentences.en: I began to walk slower and slower.
sentences.cn: 我开始走得越来越慢。

sentences.en: I've been a bit slow in making up my mind.
sentences.cn: 我下决心有些慢。

sentences.en: Ian slowed up as he approached the traffic lights.
sentences.cn: 伊恩在驶近红绿灯时放慢了速度。

sentences.en: Many people are comfortable with life in the slow lane.
sentences.cn: 很多人满足于比别人慢半拍的生活。

sentences.en: Take a few deep, slow breaths.
sentences.cn: 慢慢地深吸几口气。

sentences.en: The Board had been slow to render its verdict.
sentences.cn: 董事会迟迟未能作出决定。

sentences.en: The car was travelling at a very slow speed.
sentences.cn: 汽车正以非常慢的速度行驶。

sentences.en: The economy faces a year of slower growth.
sentences.cn: 经济将面临增长更缓慢的一年。

sentences.en: The infantry would use hit and run tactics to slow attacking forces.
sentences.cn: 步兵团可能会使用打了就跑的战术来阻滞进攻部队。

sentences.en: The lorry was travelling at 20mph in the slow lane.
sentences.cn: 卡车在慢车道上以20英里的时速行驶。

sentences.en: The rate at which hair grows can be agonisingly slow.
sentences.cn: 头发生长的速度可能极其缓慢。

sentences.en: The slow-worm is in fact not a snake but a legless lizard.
sentences.cn: 蛇蜥其实不是蛇，而是无脚的蜥蜴。

sentences.en: We turned to see the approaching car slow down.
sentences.cn: 我们转身看见驶近的车慢慢停下。

sentences.en: Why were grown-ups always so stuffy and slow to recognize good ideas?
sentences.cn: 为什么成年人总是那么一本正经，对好点子反应那么迟缓呢？

words.tran_cn: 较慢的；慢一点的（slow的比较级）

phrases.tran_cn: 龟兔赛跑；虽然慢但最后一定胜利
减速，放慢速度；使……慢下来
n. 学习迟缓者；学的慢的人

trans.tran_en: not moving, being done, or happening quickly
In informal English, slower is used to mean "at a slower speed" and slowest is used to mean "at the slowest speed." In nonstandard English, slow is used to mean "with little speed."
not moving, being done, or happening quickly
to become slower or to make something slower
